Title: 43071 - # Things to Consider When Expanding Your Business Globally
Direction: 500 words. Talk about 3-6 things business owners should consider when trying to expand a business into the global market. Discuss things like accepting international payments, identifying markets, and advertising in other countries. Your audience is business owners who have a large online component who want to attract more international customers. You could incorporate the AT by talking about hiring advertisers in other countries with Mexico as an example.
